author: ehu
msg: Remove creation and use of 'empty-file' from the .svn/ area.
Normally this would require a wc-format bump, but since we already have
a post-1.3 format bump, there is currently no need.
Remove the empty file API and make sure 'empty-file' isn't created
for caching the name of the generated empty file.
(get_empty_file): New.  Helper to create an empty file on demand,
caching and returning it on later calls.
close_file): Use get_empty_file instead of the old empty file API.

author: ehu
msg: Abstract 'file removal on pool cleanup' for general use.
(svn_io_file_del_t): New. Enum for indicating when the file ought
(svn_io_open_unique_file2): New. Adds optional file removal (by name)

author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r17171, which added an SVN_ERR() wrapper to a void function.
(load_base_props): Change return type to svn_error_t *, so that we
can forward errors from called functions to callers.

author: rooneg
msg: Move the command line client's prompting code into libsvn_subr, so that
it can be reused by other client programs.  This is a precursor to moving
the code that sets up auth batons there, so that multiple clients can
have the same behavior with regard to auth without copying large amounts
located in the command line client.
and baton for the prompting functions.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/prompt.c: Here, with the following changes.
(prompt): take a svn_cmdline_prompt_baton_t, not a svn_client_ctx_t.
(svn_cmdline_auth_simple_prompt): This.  Also use a prompt baton, not
(svn_cmdline_auth_username_prompt): This.  Also use a prompt baton,
(svn_cmdline_prompt_user): This.  Also use a prompt baton, not a
(svn_cl__get_log_message): adjust for moving of prompt functions.
